content.title: Bible Verse of the Day - Haggai 2:6-7 | Encouraging Daily Scripture Reading | Bible Study Tools
content.metaDescription: “This is what the LORD Almighty says: ‘In a little while I will once more shake the heavens and the earth, the sea and the dry land. I will shake all nations, and what is desired by all nations will come, and I will fill this house with glory,’ says the LORD Almighty.
content.content:
##  Today's Verse for Thursday, October 16 
                     [Haggai 2:6-7](https://www.biblestudytools.com/haggai/passage/?q=haggai+2:6-7)     6  “This is what the LORD Almighty says: ‘In a little while I will once more shake the heavens and the earth, the sea and the dry land.    7  I will shake all nations, and what is desired by all nations will come, and I will fill this house with glory,’ says the LORD Almighty.     [Read Haggai 2](https://www.biblestudytools.com/haggai/2.html) [All Versions](https://www.biblestudytools.com/haggai/2-6-compare.html)        [October 15](https://www.biblestudytools.com/bible-verse-of-the-day/10-15-2025/) [October 17](https://www.biblestudytools.com/bible-verse-of-the-day/10-17-2025/)   **Looking for a specific day?**
